---
category: news
title: "White Castle Tests Burger-Flipping Robot"
excerpt: "White Castle, an American fast food chain famous for steaming its burger patties under mountains of onions, is adding a robotic line cook to one of its kitchens. Flippy, an AI kitchen assistant, will soon join the crew at a currently-undisclosed White Castle location in Chicago to test the feasibility of robotic kitchen operations in fast food restaurants."
